name: Soap Dodgem
description:
In Soap Dodgem your goal is to help your happy soap friends get back to their soap holders and clean as many mold creatures on the way as you can

Use a familiar sliding puzzle gameplay with unique bathroom obstacles!

Every level holds one mysterious Golden Bubble which you can use to unlock a new chapter faster.

Finish the 120 levels campaign or play other player’s creations in the cloud!

Create your own levels in the built-in editor and share it with the World!
